text: Darkthrone is a black metal band from Norway. == Albums == *Soulside Journey *A Blaze in the Northern Sky *Under a Funeral Moon *Transilvanian Hunger *Panzerfaust *Total Death *Goatlord *Ravishing Grimness *Plaguevielder *Hate Them *The Cult Is Alive *F.O.A.D. *Dark Thrones and Black Flags *Circle the Wagons *The Underground Resistance *Arctic Thunder *Old Star *Eternal Hails...... *Astral Fortress ==References== Category:Norwegian heavy metal bands Category:Black metal bands Category:Death metal bands
title: Darkthrone
